Overview  Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
Packages
Package Description
org.prebake.channel The command channel between the client and service as speced on the wiki.
org.prebake.client The bake executable as speced on the wiki.
org.prebake.core Core abstractions such as globs, hashes and artifact listener.
org.prebake.fs Abstractions relating to the file system and the graph of dependencies between files and non-file artifacts.
org.prebake.html Utilities for dealing with documentation written in HTML.
org.prebake.js Primitives for JSON and YSON serialization and deserialization, and plumbing that defines the environment in which user JavaScript runs.
org.prebake.os Abstractions for dealing with the operating system.
org.prebake.service The prebakery executable as speced on the wiki.
org.prebake.service.bake Uses the plan graph and the toolbox to keep products up to date.
org.prebake.service.plan Tracks plan files to maintain a set of products and infer a graph of dependencies between those products.
org.prebake.service.tools Watches the tool paths and executes user JavaScript as needed to maintain an up-to-date set of tools.
org.prebake.service.tools.ext Integration points between builtin tools and external systems.
org.prebake.service.www An HTTP servlet that serves status information and documentation for tools and plans, and dependency information for products.
org.prebake.util Useful classes that are not related to the core goals of this project.
